name: Tokusatsu Bouken Katsugeki Super Hero Retsuden
overview: Tokusatsu Bouken Katsugeki Super Hero Retsuden is an Adventure game, developed by ALU and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 2000. Gameplay is quite unique as it runs like a side-scrolling, turn-based beat 'em up with lots of dialogue in between the battles.
